entries.title: OutputBag thread-safety documentation is incomplete
entries.description: The docstring claims OutputBag is thread-safe but only mentions asyncio.Lock for writes. The read methods have no thread-safety guarantees documented.
entries.context: stageflow/context/output_bag.py class docstring says Thread-safe writes with asyncio.Lock but reads are unprotected
entries.impact: Users may incorrectly assume all operations are thread-safe
entries.recommendation: Update documentation to clearly state which operations are protected and which are not.
